column4: hi, i'm not sure what support channel is most appropriate for this, but i keep having problems authenticating to my school's IIS webserver. It appears to not be a problem with ubuntu specifically, because it happens (i log in, but it redirects me to login again) on windows as well as other browsers. i've rebooted my router etc, but that hasnt helped.
nothing to do with here then, talk to your school
they didnt sound like they were getting a lot of help requests, so i'm assuming the problem is on my segment of the network
